headline: How Recent Deals And Analyst Revisions Are Rewriting The Comcast CMCSA Investment Story
summary: Comcast’s fair value estimate has been trimmed slightly to about US$33.93 per share from US$34.65, with a small adjustment lower in the discount rate to roughly 7.99% from 8.05% and long term revenue growth assumptions eased to about 1.15% from 1.53%. These shifts are rooted in fresh analyst work that weighs the Versant spin, broadband competition, and media commitments against both bullish and bearish scenarios laid out in recent research. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of these...
